metadata.title: CVE-2024-27099 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The uAMQP is a C library for AMQP 1.0 communication to Azure CloudServices. When processing an incorrect `AMQP_VALUE` failed state, may causea double free problem. This may cause a RCE. Update submodule with commit2ca42b6e4e098af2d17e487814a91d05f6ae4987.

criterions.comment: azure-uamqp-python package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
